name: jsa-generacija-17
description: web services project for SEMOS generation 17

scripts.start-windows: start npm run start-books-service && start npm run start-auth-service && start npm run start-author-service
scripts.start-server-concurrently: concurrently -n proxy,auth-service,books-service,author-service,storage "npm run start-proxy-service" "npm run start-auth-service" "npm run start-books-service" "npm run start-author-service" "npm run start-storage-service"
scripts.start-full-project-dev: start npm run start-server-concurrently && start npm run start-ui-dev

author: test-author
